pr_title: Deck tree check deal with name map

timeline.bodyText:
Is Map<String, JSONObject nameMap> valid syntax?
I'd have assumed Map<String, JSONObject> nameMap
timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText: Clearly, the > should have been before
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior

timeline.message:
Deck tree check deal with name map

It seems I totally forgot to ensure that `_checkDeckTree` change the
name map. The main problem here being that it changes name using JSON
operation and not the method `rename`. Actually, using `rename` would
be almost impossible, because `rename` would risk to raise an
exception due to name duplication.

Instead, I simply ensure that the map is created again when there is
any error.

This should solve #6590 and also other potential error later.

As a side note, I am happy that I decided to raise an exception if
byName returns a deck with a wrong name. We would note have found it
otherwise, and it seems quite good to see it here
